import json

# Create and populate a list of dictionaries
list_of_dicts = [{'name': 'John', 'age': 25}, {'name': 'Jane', 'age': 30}, {'name': 'Bob', 'age': 20}]

# Join the list of dictionaries into a single json string
joined_json_string = json.dumps(list_of_dicts)

# Print the result
print(joined_json_string)
